attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: Opened state of the toast, use event to change

attributes.name: text
attributes.description: Plain text based message to display

attributes.name: class-style
attributes.description: Class name, fit-bottom being a useful one

attributes.name: duration
attributes.description: How long the toast message should be displayed

attributes.name: event-callback
attributes.description: Event callback when hide is called

attributes.name: close-button
attributes.description: If there should be a close button shown
